title: CodeX Workshop 2022
description:
April 2 & 23, 2022 - The CodeX Workshop 2022 gave focus on competitive programming training, in addition to the usual Java programming and problem-solving lessons. It was a way for students to be inspired to join and to prepare to join programming competitions. 

The workshop had two sessions. The first session was held on April 2, 2022 which was exclusive to MCL-SHS students only and the second session was held on April 23, 2022 which was open to Senior High School students from other schools/universities.
summary: The CodeX Workshop 2022 gave focus on competitive programming training, in addition to the usual Java programming and problem-solving lessons.
